overview: Director Wei Xing independently filmed the documentary "Jesus Bless You" in 2002, as both director and cinematographer. The film won the 10th Beijing University Student Film Festival Student Unit Professional Group Documentary Excellence Award (the best vacancy), the second Beijing International University Student Film Festival Silver Award in 2003, the 2003 Hong Kong Independent Film and Video Competition. the 2003 "Jesus "Bless You" is collected by the University of San Diego Library.
title: Jesus Loves You
